attributes.title: NEVER AGAIN
attributes.review: 🧚🏻‍♂️I OPEN THE APP AND I SEE CHEETOS ON THE FRONT PAGE I FEEL VERY DISRESPECTED FOR SUPPORTING TRUMP.NEVER AGAIN.HE THINKS WE A JOKE.GOOD BYEEE🧚🏻‍♂️.this app is also ⚠️bad luck⚠️ i broke my leg when i got the app and weird things have been happening.DO NOT GET THIS APP! ITS BAD NEWS!

attributes.title: This App Collects Your Data And Emails Russian Operatives
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and before I knew it I was getting robo calls from online purveyors or borscht, caviar, and hats made of beaver fur. You can tell that this is all jacked in to Russian intelligence because when you hack into the code all the comments are in the Cyrillic alphabet. DOWNLOAD AT YOUR OWN RISK!

attributes.title: My pp went bye bye🤤💅🤠✌️✨🥩
attributes.review: Okay so let’s start from two beginning. This morning I looked up good sites to hear news about our president ✨big T✨ but since I am a Gen Z I obviously no nothing about him ( like he’s obviously not racist or a rapist) 🥩anyways🥩 I just love our president 🤤rump🤤 the research I did lead me to this app🤠💅 I iMMEDIATELY downloaded this app🥵 but my butt started tingling and just didn’t feel right🤔🤭🧴 as soon as the app got done downloading I look at the floor and SAW MY PP ON THE GROUNDDD🥴 this app is horrible I wasn’t even supposed to cut my pp off for another 6 weeks🤠 I’m trying a grow it out🥴🥖🤭 anyways....... don’t get this app your ding aling will fall offffff🤪

attributes.title: Fake news and insecure
attributes.review:
The app has “News” and “Social” tabs offering carefully selected feeds of tweets and articles that reinforce the campaign’s talking points, often actively deceiving readers with highly questionable or entirely disproven information. 

Most messages, articles, and announcements inside the Trump app have no named author; they rarely cite sources beyond government press releases and tweets from Trump’s own supporters and White House staff.

This app was compiled with an older version of Android, which does not include some of the latest privacy improvements and leave users open to hacking and cyber threats. It requires users to provide phone number, email address and zip code and encourager users to share their phone contacts.

Download at your own risk.

attributes.title: disappointed but not surprised
attributes.review:
i was ever so excited to download this app and help be a supportive citizen of trump! his orange skin and hair that looks like a sheep’s butt, it’s so immaculate that i just had to bow down to our lovely president and get his app. as soon as i opened the app it’s as if every cursed thing you could ever thing of started happening to me!!! as i sat in my room under my bedding i could hear the stomps of some huge creature on my roof!! as i opened my window to pop out my head i saw it... ✨🧚‍♀️ s h r e k 🧚‍♀️✨ although this was a very pleasant surprise, i was still absolutely terrified! shrek was the colors of red blue and white!! 
“what are you doing in my swamp!!?” shrek yelled at me.
“b-but shrek! this is MY SWAMP!!” i replied back.
apparently shrek didn’t like that response because he took me bungee jumping off the roof of my house except it was 🧚‍♀️✨ w i r e l e s s 🧚‍♀️✨ i was ready to hit the ground, i was ready to die! but when i didn’t feel the cold hard ground against my small crooked body... i realized something was off. i opened my eyes and to my surprise i was laying in the arms of THANOS!! he was carrying me bridal style and i was speechless! he was so majestic! running while his strong legs were powerfully strutting, his muscular veiny arms that were wrapped around me, and his cold but handsome emotionless face.
“thanos...” i said, “w-where are you taking me?” 
“away from here my love,” he replied, “trump is trying to murder you with american shrek... i can’t let that happen to the love of my life!!” 
“oh thanos, you’re so brave” i said while blushing and doing the debby ryan smirk. 
and as night began to fall, we ran towards the sunset to be safe and never support trump again! 🥰🥰

attributes.title: screen mishap
attributes.review: i downloaded this lovely app to see what the “hype” was about as soon as i had opened it there was a cheeto on my screen. my 4 year old son thought it was edible and TOOK A BITE OUT OF MY SCREEN. which had cracked the glass and broke the inside.After that he proceeded to throw the phone on the ground saying that I’m a bad person for downloading it. so now i need a new phone and my 4 year old proves to be a more educated person than cheeto supporters. thank you
